tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (NP (NP (NN school)) (ADJP (JJ bright) (CC and) (JJ early)) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT the) (NN morning)))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [school/NN amod>[bright/JJ cc>and/CC conj:and>early/JJ] amod>early/JJ nmod:in>[morning/NN case>in/IN det>the/DT] punct>!/.]
